abstract: Following its deal with Microsoft, Yahoo finds itself once again trying to explain what kind of company it is and what it will be.
snippet: Following its deal with Microsoft, Yahoo finds itself once again trying to explain what kind of company it is and what it will be.
lead_paragraph: The dust has settled – for the moment – on the Microsoft and Yahoo search and advertising deal. So, perhaps there’s room for a bit of reflection.

headline.main: Yahoo Chief: ‘We Have Never Been a Search Company’
